Title: KIRKS FOLLY RARE/SIGNED "CHERUB IN HEART" BROOCH W/A HEART/MOON/STAR/FLOWR #28
Description: NEW KIRKS FOLLY... RARE-RETIRED-SIGNED "CHERUB IN A HEART W/RHINESTONES" brooch with many sweet details. This is one charming & wonderful piece! Just look at the lovely heart, star filled with crystal rhinestones and a crescent moon w/a face and a simple gold flower to finish the dangles. Fabulous details! The brooch dangles to 2-1/ 4" by 1-1/2" wide and has the Kirks Folly logo on the back. The rhinestone studded star also has the Kirks Folly logo. Lovely to look at...even better to wear it! We will include a FREE gift box w/purchase. A wonderful piece to add to your growing Kirks Folly collection (or to get one started). *Please note, props used in our photos are Not included w/purchase unless otherwise specified. The lucky buyer will receive the piece via USPS first class mail for Just $3.15 to USA addresses only (*excludes The Virgin Islands & Guam as these areas require additional postage), in a Kirks Folly gift box or a generic box (while supplies last). We only accept PayPal for payment. The Buy Now feature requires instant payment. Returns after 14 days of sale, OK however, buyer pays shipping both ways. If a return is necessary, item must be returned in perfect, unused condition and in the gift box before a PayPal refund can be issued. *Please let us know if you have any issues with your purchase and give us the opportunity to correct any issues prior to leaving anything but Positive Feedback. We enjoy and treasure our positive feedback. *International bidders will be given shipping charge at end of auction. Each country can be significantly different in price. International buyers are solely responsible for any & all taxes or duties assessed by their country. Please do not ask us to change the value on the customs forms. Good luck & happy eBaying. Buy with confidence from this eBay seller! Be sure to list us on your Favorite Seller's list so you won't miss any Fabulous listings! THANKS FOR LOOKING!
